parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of entities in one page

parameters.name: dateRangeColumn
parameters.description: Column name for filter startAt and endAt

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API token
Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API token

post.description: This endpoint allows you to scrape a shopee scraper.

url.description: Shopee product api url get_pc with shop id and item id

scraperId.description: Unique identifier of the scraper to rerun

success.description: Indicates if the scraping operation was successful

data.description: Scraped data object with dynamic properties based on extraction

html_path.description: Local path to the saved HTML file

token_usage.description: Number of tokens used for this scraping operation

error.description: Error message if the operation failed, empty string if successful

screenshot_path.description: Local path to the saved screenshot

screenshot_url.description: Pre-signed URL to access the screenshot

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong

message.example: You do not have permission to access this resource
